Title: BP to offtake 1 mtpa from Oman LNG starting 2026
Description: Oman LNG has agreed a deal to supply of 1 mtpa of LNG on a free-on-board basis from its 10.9 mtpa Qalhat LNG plant to BP for a period of nine years, starting in 2026.
Author: JS

Title: Golar expects Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG project to start commercial operations in 2H 2024
Description: Marine LNG infrastructure firm Golar expects commercial operations at the planned BP-operated 2.4 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG (FLNG) in Senegal and Mauritania to begin in the second half of the year, following the start of a six-month commissioning period in January.
Author: CK
